text: Python: Random combination from two files
New to python, bear with me.
I have two text files, each has a word on a line (some funny words).
I want to create a third file which has the random combination of those.

code:
File1:
Smile
Sad
Noob
Happy
...

File2:
Face
Apple
Orange
...

File3:
Smile Orange
Sad Apple
Noob Face
.....
